Immerse yourself in elegance with Hatsune Miku in her traditional attire.

🎨 Minimalist Design: Featuring Hatsune Miku dressed in a stunning traditional outfit, gazing with her large, captivating yellow eyes against a serene and artistic backdrop.
⏰ Clock and Date: Keep track of time with a display that complements the timeless charm of the theme.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite sites, blending functionality with Miku’s graceful presence.
🎮 Play Games: Enjoy interactive experiences inspired by Hatsune Miku’s vibrant world.
🔍 Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches while admiring Miku’s elegance.
🚀 More Extensions: Customize your browser further to match the beauty and style of Hatsune Miku.
